artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Ebisuya Shōshichi
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: each sheet, red artist\'s toshidama seal; censor seals: 衣笠 {Kinugasa}, 村田 {Murata}, シタ賣 {shitauri}; publisher\'s seal: てりふり丁、ゑびすや {Terifurichō, Ebisuya}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: R, L: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga}; center: 一陽齋豊國画 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Kinoshita Soga megumi no masagoji 木下曽我恵砂路, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 1851, 1st month.
title: Actors Bandō Hikosaburō IV as Mashiba Tairyō Hisayoshi, Morita Kan'ya XI as Kataoka Miki-no-kami Tatsumoto, Nakayama Ichizō I as Nakayama Gentōta Sōren, Iwai Kumesaburō III as Midai Aya-no-kata, Ichikawa Kodanji IV as Ishikawa Goemon etc.
